name: Size
description:
A creature belongs to a size category: Tiny, Small, Medium, Large, Huge, or Gargantuan.

| Size | Space |
|---|---|
| Tiny | 2.5 by 2.5 ft. |
| Small | 5 by 5 ft. |
| Medium | 5 by 5 ft. |
| Large | 10 by 10 ft. |
| Huge | 15 by 15 ft. |
| Gargantuan | 20 by 20 ft. or larger |
